title: Sakura樱模组 温泉刷新太多 权重怎么设置比较好
author: lc2105342
txt_content: 希望可以给个权重设置 几乎不刷新或者完全不刷新的

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
.minecraft/config/sakura.cfg

    # Changes generate rate of Hot Spring. Increase value to gen more Hot Spring.
    # Min: 0
    # Max: 5000
    I:hotspring_weight=10

这一段就是
